name: Grilled Salmon & Asparagus
description: Omega-3 rich salmon fillet with grilled asparagus. Perfect for heart and muscle health.

instructions.instruction: Remove salmon from refrigerator 15 minutes before cooking.
Snap off tough ends of asparagus.
instructions.tip: They naturally break at the tender point.

instructions.instruction: Coat salmon and asparagus with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Heat grill pan over medium-high heat.
Place salmon skin-side down on the grill.
Cook for 4-5 minutes without touching, then flip.
instructions.tip: Skin should be crispy - don't force it if it sticks.

instructions.instruction: Cook the other side for 3-4 minutes. Center should remain slightly pink.
Add asparagus to grill, cook for 3-4 minutes, turning occasionally.
Transfer salmon to plates, rest for 2 minutes.
Squeeze lemon juice over, garnish with dill, and serve.

tips: Salmon is one of the richest sources of omega-3 fatty acids.
Asparagus contains vitamin K and folate.
Low carb and high protein - keto-friendly.
Internal temperature for medium salmon should be 52-54°C (125-130°F).
storageInfo: Cooked salmon can be refrigerated for 2 days.
servingSuggestion: Serve with quinoa or brown rice.
variations: Trout or sea bass can be substituted.
